birthDeclarationNotification: Birth registration tracking ID for {{name}} is {{trackingid}}. You will get an SMS within 2 days with progress and next steps.
birthRegistrationNotification: Congratulations, the birth of {{name}} has been registered. Visit your local registration office with your ID to collect the certificate.
birthRejectionNotification: Birth registration application for {{name}} ( Tracking ID: {{trackingid}} ) has been rejected. Please visit your local registration office for more information.
deathDeclarationNotification: Death registration tracking ID for {{name}} is {{trackingid}}. You will get an SMS within 2 days with progress and next steps.
deathRegistrationNotification: The death of {{name}} has been registered. Visit your local registration office with your ID to collect the certificate.
deathRejectionNotification: Death registration application for {{name}} ( Tracking ID: {{trackingid}} ) has been rejected. Please visit your local registration office for more information.
userCredentialsNotification: You can login to OpenCRVS with this temporary username: {{username}} and password: {{password}}
